points on the highest stage you can ever score,'' said Linas Kleiza , whose previous career-high of 29 came March 15 against the Los Angeles Lakers.`` It was definitely a special night,'' Linas Kleiza said. The Nuggets have been searching for a consistent third scorer behind Anthony Atkinson and Allen Iverson , and Linas Kleiza filled the role Thursday.
